name: Haris Slayer
description:
He must be destroyed

Hello my Name is Dnold I am 18 years old and I am also a total beginer in game dev. I work as a Software Engineer Trainee at a small German Company, where I don't do that much. Sometime ago I really wanted to start to develop my own game. I already knew C#, so Unity couldn't be that big of a struggle (it was that big of a struggle) So I started making this game with a little help of my friends. You can look at the credits if u wanna find out more about the people that are working on this game (Seriously thanks for the Art. I couldn't make this whole thing without it :)). The Game takes place in a school which I recreated from my memories of my old school. You are a student trapped and hunted by teachers (which is Haris... It's an insider joke). Your only chance to fight back. Yes. this is a Top-Down Shooter in a School. It's not that easy but I am sure u will get the hang of it.

HAVE FUN!

If you have any Bug to report, feel free to Mail me. I am also open for feedback and further questions about the game

dnold.png@gmail.com Controls are pretty self self-explanatory
  • WASD    -       Move
  • LMB    -       Shoot
  • 'R'      -     Reload
  • Shift     -      Run
  • ESC       -      Pause
  • 1 or 2     -     Switch Weapons
